channel.title: Please help me im making a server
channel.description: when i downloaded the allstar scape source i wuz logged in to the allstarscape thing then when my friend wanted 2 join he couldnt can any1 please help me and yes i did portforward but i dont know if i did it right lol im pretty sure i did though my friend isnt logging in to my server is because if the ip which ip do i use for him to log in to my server? plz help me and the ip he uses to sign into my server work for all the servers aslo plz help me

item.title: Please help me im making a server
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

Portforwarding topics are not allowed in server help.

Refer to the: Make a Server and Portforwarding guides to be absolutely sure you did everything correct.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me im making a server
